definition: to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with
overtones in conversation/things indirectly implied from what is said
to ask a question, already knowing the answer
A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: crow's beak/(fig.) person who makes an inauspicious remark
shit youth/used satirically against 憤青|愤青 which shares the same sound/see also 憤青|愤青[fen4 qing1]
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
lit. 300 silver taels not hidden here (idiom); fig. to reveal what one intends to hide
pinyin: ci3 di4 wu2 yin2 san1 bai3 liang3

definition: (dialect) hen/prostitute/(Tw) interfering/nosy/busybody (from Taiwanese 家婆, Tai-lo pr. [ke-pô])
